meanings.definition: A small, flat, folding case for carrying paper money, credit cards, and identification cards.
meanings.sent1: My dad keeps his money in his wallet.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new wallet to keep her cards safe.
meanings.sent3: The wallet was so full, it looked like a mini book.
meanings.sent4: His wallet was a treasure trove of memories and cash.
meanings.sent5: The shiny wallet gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A pocket-sized, flat, folding case for holding paper money and plastic cards.
meanings.sent1: I found my lost wallet under the bed.
meanings.sent2: Her wallet matched her purse perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The wallet seemed to hide in the depths of her bag.
meanings.sent4: His wallet was a loyal companion on his travels.
meanings.sent5: The worn-out wallet told stories of its adventures.
